data.description: Build, test, and install Perl modules
data.communities: perl5-porters list, module-build list at sf.net, module-authors list
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
1) Doesn't depend on 'make', so modules can be built & installed on
    systems without it, or with weird variants of it.

    2) Doesn't require bizarre regex contortions on make rules in order
    to customize installation/testing behavior.

    3) Allows subclassing in a straightforward manner.

    -Ken
